mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.article_id, o.article_cover, o.article_title, o.total_fee, COUNT(o.article_id) as article_num FROM `tb_order` as o where o.user_id = #{userId} and o.is_delete = 0 and o.status = 0 GROUP BY o.article_id

SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.article_id, o.article_cover, o.article_title, o.total_fee, o.update_time, COUNT(o.article_id) as article_num FROM `tb_order` as o where o.user_id = #{userId} and o.is_delete = 0 and o.status = 1 GROUP BY o.article_id order By o.update_time ASC
